DOC.brief_summary: The Neurotrack Virtual Cognitive Health Study 6-month long , prospective , intent-to-treat , study aim evaluate impact Neurotrack Virtual Cognitive Health Coaching Program cognitive ability , anxiety depression , lifestyle behavior individual show sign subjective cognitive decline . After first 6 month study , study researcher may extend study provide participant opportunity continue participate study additional 6 month .
DOC.criteria: Ages 6075 Individuals show sign subjective cognitive decline ( assessed score â‰¥ 1 Subjective Cognitive Decline [ Short Form ] Questionnaire endorse Personal Worry Item questionnaire ) Have ability make receive phone call Have ability send receive text message Access desktop computer , videoteleconferencing reliable internet connection Motivated use daily coach program Significant history mental illness , substance abuse , learn disability , neurologic condition History dementia Ophthalmologic/visual problem prevent individual viewing computer screen normal distance ( e.g. , legal blindness , detach retina , occlusive cataract ) Currently participate formal cognitivetraining coach program Currently pregnant
